title: Orientable sequences over non-binary alphabets
authors: Abbas Alhakim, Chris J. Mitchell, Janusz Szmidt, Peter R. Wild
abstract:
We describe new, simple, recursive methods of construction for orientable
sequences over an arbitrary finite alphabet, i.e. periodic sequences in which
any sub-sequence of n consecutive elements occurs at most once in a period in
either direction. In particular we establish how two variants of a generalised
Lempel homomorphism can be used to recursively construct such sequences,
generalising previous work on the binary case. We also derive an upper bound on
the period of an orientable sequence.
